name: Bowmaster Legacy December 2021 Demo
description:
This demo lets you play one long level with several magical arrows unlocked. You will face several waves of enemies, each showcasing the various sets of enemy types in the game. The demo takes about 10 minutes to complete. Download and extract the zip then run "Bowmaster Legacy.exe". Window may not run it initially, and display a prompt stating this is an untrusted program. You'll need to click "more info" before you get the option to "Run Anyway".

Check out the latest news about the project here:
https://www.lostvectors.com/bowmasterlegacy/
